00360 // void set_default(void) method
00361 
00362 void NewtonMethod::set_default(void)
00363 {
00364    // TRAINING PARAMETERS
00365 
00366    warning_parameters_norm = 1.0e6;
00367    warning_gradient_norm = 1.0e6;   
00368    warning_training_rate = 1.0e6;
00369 
00370    error_parameters_norm = 1.0e9;
00371    error_gradient_norm = 1.0e9;
00372    error_training_rate = 1.0e9;
00373 
00374    // STOPPING CRITERIA
00375 
00376    minimum_parameters_increment_norm = 0.0;
00377 
00378    minimum_performance_increase = 0.0;
00379    performance_goal = -1.0e99;
00380    gradient_norm_goal = 0.0;
00381    maximum_generalization_evaluation_decreases = 1000000;
00382 
00383    maximum_epochs_number = 1000;
00384    maximum_time = 1000.0;
00385 
00386    // TRAINING HISTORY
00387 
00388    reserve_parameters_history = false;
00389    reserve_parameters_norm_history = false;
00390 
00391    reserve_evaluation_history = true;
00392    reserve_gradient_history = false;
00393    reserve_gradient_norm_history = false;
00394    reserve_generalization_evaluation_history = false;
00395 
00396    reserve_training_direction_history = false;
00397    reserve_training_rate_history = false;
00398    reserve_elapsed_time_history = false;
00399 
00400    // UTILITIES
00401 
00402    display = true;
00403    display_period = 100;
00404 
00405 }
00406

00408 // void set_warning_parameters_norm(const double&) method
00409 
00413 
00414 void NewtonMethod::set_warning_parameters_norm(const double& new_warning_parameters_norm)
00415 {
00416    // Control sentence (if debug)
00417 
00418    #ifdef _DEBUG 
00419 
00420    if(new_warning_parameters_norm < 0.0)
00421    {
00422       std::ostringstream buffer;
00423 
00424       buffer << "OpenNN Exception: NewtonMethod class.\n"
00425              << "void set_warning_parameters_norm(const double&) method.\n"
00426              << "Warning parameters norm must be equal or greater than 0.\n";
00427 
00428       throw std::logic_error(buffer.str().c_str());       
00429    }
00430 
00431    #endif
00432 
00433    // Set warning parameters norm
00434 
00435    warning_parameters_norm = new_warning_parameters_norm;     
00436 }
00437

00901 // void set_display_period(unsigned int) method
00902 
00906 
00907 void NewtonMethod::set_display_period(const unsigned int& new_display_period)
00908 {
00909    // Control sentence (if debug)
00910 
00911    #ifdef _DEBUG 
00912      
00913    if(new_display_period <= 0)
00914    {
00915       std::ostringstream buffer;
00916 
00917       buffer << "OpenNN Exception: NewtonMethod class.\n"
00918              << "void set_display_period(const double&) method.\n"
00919              << "First training rate must be greater than 0.\n";
00920 
00921       throw std::logic_error(buffer.str().c_str());       
00922    }
00923 
00924    #endif
00925 
00926    display_period = new_display_period;
00927 }
00928 
00929 
00930 
00931 // Vector<double> calculate_gradient_descent_training_direction(const Vector<double>&) const method
00932 
00935 
00936 Vector<double> NewtonMethod::calculate_gradient_descent_training_direction(const Vector<double>& gradient) const
00937 {
00938    double gradient_norm = gradient.calculate_norm();
00939 
00940    return(gradient*(-1.0/gradient_norm));
00941 }
00942 
00943 
00944 // Vector<double> calculate_training_direction(const Vector<double>&, const Matrix<double>&) const method
00945 
00949 
00950 Vector<double> NewtonMethod::calculate_training_direction
00951 (const Vector<double>& gradient, const Matrix<double>& inverse_Hessian) const
00952 {
00953    Vector<double> training_direction = inverse_Hessian.dot(gradient)*(-1.0);
00954 
00955    double training_direction_norm = training_direction.calculate_norm();
00956 
00957    return(training_direction/training_direction_norm);
00958 }
00959 
00960 
00961 // void resize_training_history(const unsigned int&) method
00962 
00965 
00966 void NewtonMethod::NewtonMethodResults::resize_training_history(const unsigned int& new_size)
00967 {
00968    parameters_history.resize(new_size);
00969    parameters_norm_history.resize(new_size);
00970 
00971    evaluation_history.resize(new_size);
00972    generalization_evaluation_history.resize(new_size);
00973    gradient_history.resize(new_size);
00974    gradient_norm_history.resize(new_size);
00975    inverse_Hessian_history.resize(new_size);
00976    
00977    training_direction_history.resize(new_size);
00978    training_rate_history.resize(new_size);
00979    elapsed_time_history.resize(new_size);
00980 }
00981 
00982 
00983 // std::string to_string(void) const method
00984 
00986 
00987 std::string NewtonMethod::NewtonMethodResults::to_string(void) const
00988 {
00989    std::ostringstream buffer;
00990 
00991    // Parameters history
00992 
00993    if(!parameters_history.empty())
00994    {
00995       if(!parameters_history[0].empty())
00996       {
00997           buffer << "% Parameters history:\n"
00998                  << parameters_history << "\n"; 
00999           }
01000    }
01001 
01002    // Parameters norm history
01003 
01004    if(!parameters_norm_history.empty())
01005    {
01006        buffer << "% Parameters norm history:\n"
01007               << parameters_norm_history << "\n"; 
01008    }
01009    
01010    // Evaluation history   
01011 
01012    if(!evaluation_history.empty())
01013    {
01014        buffer << "% Evaluation history:\n"
01015               << evaluation_history << "\n"; 
01016    }
01017 
01018    // Generalization evaluation history
01019 
01020    if(!generalization_evaluation_history.empty())
01021    {
01022        buffer << "% Generalization evaluation history:\n"
01023               << generalization_evaluation_history << "\n"; 
01024    }
01025 
01026    // Gradient history 
01027 
01028    if(!gradient_history.empty())
01029    {
01030       if(!gradient_history[0].empty())
01031       {
01032           buffer << "% Gradient history:\n"
01033                  << gradient_history << "\n"; 
01034           }
01035    }
01036 
01037    // Gradient norm history
01038 
01039    if(!gradient_norm_history.empty())
01040    {
01041        buffer << "% Gradient norm history:\n"
01042               << gradient_norm_history << "\n"; 
01043    }
01044 
01045    // Inverse Hessian history
01046 
01047    if(!inverse_Hessian_history.empty())
01048    {
01049       if(!inverse_Hessian_history[0].empty())
01050       {
01051           buffer << "% Inverse Hessian history:\n"
01052                  << inverse_Hessian_history << "\n"; 
01053           }
01054    }
01055 
01056    // Training direction history
01057 
01058    if(!training_direction_history.empty())
01059    {
01060       if(!training_direction_history[0].empty())
01061       {
01062           buffer << "% Training direction history:\n"
01063                  << training_direction_history << "\n"; 
01064           }
01065    }
01066 
01067    // Training rate history
01068 
01069    if(!training_rate_history.empty())
01070    {
01071        buffer << "% Training rate history:\n"
01072               << training_rate_history << "\n"; 
01073    }
01074 
01075    // Elapsed time history
01076 
01077    if(!elapsed_time_history.empty())
01078    {
01079        buffer << "% Elapsed time history:\n"
01080               << elapsed_time_history << "\n"; 
01081    }
01082 
01083    return(buffer.str());
01084 }

01087 // NewtonMethodResults* perform_training(void) method
01088 
01092 
01093 NewtonMethod::NewtonMethodResults* NewtonMethod::perform_training(void)
01094 {
01095    std::ostringstream buffer;
01096 
01097    buffer << "OpenNN Exception: NewtonMethod class.\n"
01098           << "NewtonMethodResults* perform_training(void) method.\n"
01099           << "This method is under development.\n";
01100 
01101    throw std::logic_error(buffer.str().c_str());          
01102 
01103 /*
01104    // Control sentence (if debug)
01105 
01106    #ifdef _DEBUG 
01107 
01108    check();
01109 
01110    #endif
01111 
01112    // Start training 
01113 
01114    if(display)
01115    {
01116       std::cout << "Training with Newton's method...\n";
01117    }
01118 
01119    NewtonMethodResults* Newton_method_training_results_pointer = new NewtonMethodResults;
01120 
01121    // Elapsed time
01122 
01123    time_t beginning_time, current_time;

01137    double parameters_increment_norm;

01142    double old_generalization_evaluation = 0.0;
01143    double generalization_evaluation_increment = 0.0;
01144       
01145    double performance = 0.0;
01146    double old_performance = 0.0;
01147    double performance_increase = 0.0;
01148 
01149    Vector<double> gradient(parameters_number);
01150    double gradient_norm;
01151 
01152    Matrix<double> inverse_Hessian(parameters_number, parameters_number);
01153

01155 
01156    Vector<double> old_gradient(parameters_number);
01157    Vector<double> training_direction(parameters_number);
01158    Vector<double> gradient_descent_training_direction(parameters_number);

01165    //double old_training_rate = 0.0;

01168    directional_point[0] = 0.0;
01169    directional_point[1] = 0.0;
01170    
01171    bool stop_training = false;
01172

01174    // Main loop
01175 
01176    for(unsigned int epoch = 0; epoch <= maximum_epochs_number; epoch++)
01177    {
01178       // Multilayer perceptron 
01179 
01180       parameters = neural_network_pointer->arrange_parameters();
01181 
01182       parameters_norm = parameters.calculate_norm();
01183 
01184       if(display && parameters_norm >= warning_parameters_norm)
01185       {
01186          std::cout << "OpenNN Warning: Parameters norm is " << parameters_norm << ".\n";          
01187       }
01188 
01189       // Performance functional stuff
01190 
01191       if(epoch == 0)
01192       {      
01193          performance = performance_functional_pointer->calculate_evaluation();
01194          performance_increase = 0.0; 
01195       }
01196       else
01197       {
01198          performance = directional_point[1];
01199          performance_increase = old_performance - performance; 
01200       }
01201 
01202       generalization_evaluation = performance_functional_pointer->calculate_generalization_evaluation();
01203 
01204       if(epoch == 0)
01205       {
01206          generalization_evaluation_increment = 0.0;
01207       }
01208       else 
01209       {
01210          generalization_evaluation_increment = generalization_evaluation - old_generalization_evaluation;
01211       }
01212 
01213       gradient = performance_functional_pointer->calculate_gradient();
01214 
01215       gradient_norm = gradient.calculate_norm();
01216 
01217       if(display && gradient_norm >= warning_gradient_norm)
01218       {
01219          std::cout << "OpenNN Warning: Gradient norm is " << gradient_norm << ".\n";          
01220       }
01221 
01222       inverse_Hessian = performance_functional_pointer->calculate_inverse_Hessian();
01223 
01224       // Training algorithm 
01225 
01226       training_direction = calculate_training_direction(gradient, inverse_Hessian);
01227 
01228       // Calculate evaluation training_slope
01229 
01230       training_slope = (gradient/gradient_norm).dot(training_direction);
01231 
01232       // Check for a descent direction 
01233 
01234       if(training_slope >= 0.0)
01235       {
01236          if(display)
01237                  {
01238                          std::cout << "Epoch " << epoch << ": Training slope is greater than zero. Reseting training direction.\n";
01239                  }
01240 
01241          // Reset training direction
01242 
01243          training_direction = calculate_gradient_descent_training_direction(gradient);
01244       }
01245             
01246       if(epoch == 0)
01247       {
01248 //         initial_training_rate = first_training_rate;
01249       }
01250       else
01251       {
01252 //         initial_training_rate = old_training_rate;
01253       }    
01254       
01255 //        directional_point = calculate_directional_point(performance, training_direction, initial_training_rate);
01256 
01257           training_rate = directional_point[0];
01258 
01259       parameters_increment = training_direction*training_rate;
01260       parameters_increment_norm = parameters_increment.calculate_norm();
01261       
01262       // Elapsed time
01263 
01264       time(&current_time);
01265       elapsed_time = difftime(current_time, beginning_time);
01266 
01267       // Training history multilayer perceptron 
01268 
01269       if(reserve_parameters_history)
01270       {
01271          Newton_method_training_results_pointer->parameters_history[epoch] = parameters;                                
01272       }
01273 
01274       if(reserve_parameters_norm_history)
01275       {
01276          Newton_method_training_results_pointer->parameters_norm_history[epoch] = parameters_norm; 
01277       }
01278 
01279       // Training history performance functional
01280 
01281       if(reserve_evaluation_history)
01282       {
01283          Newton_method_training_results_pointer->evaluation_history[epoch] = performance;
01284       }
01285 
01286       if(reserve_generalization_evaluation_history)
01287       {
01288          Newton_method_training_results_pointer->generalization_evaluation_history[epoch] = generalization_evaluation;
01289       }
01290 
01291       if(reserve_gradient_history)
01292       {
01293          Newton_method_training_results_pointer->gradient_history[epoch] = gradient;                                
01294       }
01295 
01296       if(reserve_gradient_norm_history)
01297       {
01298          Newton_method_training_results_pointer->gradient_norm_history[epoch] = gradient_norm;
01299       }
01300 
01301       if(reserve_inverse_Hessian_history)
01302       {
01303          Newton_method_training_results_pointer->inverse_Hessian_history[epoch] = inverse_Hessian;
01304       }
01305 
01306       // Training history training algorithm
01307 
01308       if(reserve_training_direction_history)
01309       {
01310          Newton_method_training_results_pointer->training_direction_history[epoch] = training_direction;                                
01311       }
01312 
01313       if(reserve_training_rate_history)
01314       {
01315          Newton_method_training_results_pointer->training_rate_history[epoch] = training_rate;
01316       }
01317 
01318       if(reserve_elapsed_time_history)
01319       {
01320          Newton_method_training_results_pointer->elapsed_time_history[epoch] = elapsed_time;
01321       }
01322 
01323           // Stopping Criteria
01324 
01325       if(parameters_increment_norm <= minimum_parameters_increment_norm)
01326       {
01327          if(display)
01328          {
01329             std::cout << "Epoch " << epoch << ": Minimum parameters increment norm reached.\n"
01330                                   << "Parameters increment norm: " << parameters_increment_norm << std::endl;
01331          }
01332 
01333          stop_training = true;
01334       }
01335 
01336       else if(performance <= performance_goal)
01337       {
01338          if(display)
01339          {
01340             std::cout << "Epoch " << epoch << ": Performance goal reached.\n";
01341          }
01342 
01343          stop_training = true;
01344       }
01345 
01346       else if(epoch != 0 && performance_increase <= minimum_performance_increase)
01347       {
01348          if(display)
01349          {
01350             std::cout << "Epoch " << epoch << ": Minimum performance increase reached.\n"
01351                       << "Performance improvement: " << performance_increase << std::endl;
01352          }
01353 
01354          stop_training = true;
01355       }
01356 
01357       else if(epoch != 0 && generalization_evaluation_increment < 0.0)
01358       {
01359          if(display)
01360          {
01361             std::cout << "Epoch " << epoch << ": Generalization performance stopped improving.\n";
01362             std::cout << "Generalization performance increment: "<< generalization_evaluation_increment << std::endl;
01363          }
01364 
01365          stop_training = true;
01366       }
01367 
01368       else if(gradient_norm <= gradient_norm_goal)
01369       {
01370          if(display)
01371          {
01372             std::cout << "Epoch " << epoch << ": Gradient norm goal reached.\n";  
01373          }
01374 
01375          stop_training = true;
01376       }
01377 
01378       if(epoch == maximum_epochs_number)
01379       {
01380          if(display)
01381          {
01382             std::cout << "Epoch " << epoch << ": Maximum number of epochs reached.\n";
01383          }
01384 
01385          stop_training = true;
01386       }
01387 
01388       else if(elapsed_time >= maximum_time)
01389       {
01390          if(display)
01391          {
01392             std::cout << "Epoch " << epoch << ": Maximum training time reached.\n";
01393          }
01394 
01395          stop_training = true;
01396       }
01397 
01398           if(stop_training)
01399       {
01400          Newton_method_training_results_pointer->final_parameters = parameters;
01401          Newton_method_training_results_pointer->final_parameters_norm = parameters_norm;
01402 
01403          Newton_method_training_results_pointer->final_evaluation = performance;
01404          Newton_method_training_results_pointer->final_generalization_evaluation = generalization_evaluation;
01405 
01406          Newton_method_training_results_pointer->final_gradient = gradient;
01407          Newton_method_training_results_pointer->final_gradient_norm = gradient_norm;
01408    
01409          Newton_method_training_results_pointer->final_training_direction = training_direction;
01410          Newton_method_training_results_pointer->final_training_rate = training_rate;
01411          Newton_method_training_results_pointer->elapsed_time = elapsed_time;
01412 
01413          if(display)
01414                  {
01415             std::cout << "Parameters norm: " << parameters_norm << "\n"
01416                       << "Performance: " << performance << "\n"
01417                                           << "Gradient norm: " << gradient_norm << "\n"
01418                       << performance_functional_pointer->write_information()
01419                       << "Training rate: " << training_rate << "\n"
01420                       << "Elapsed time: " << elapsed_time << std::endl; 
01421 
01422             if(generalization_evaluation != 0)
01423             {
01424                std::cout << "Generalization performance: " << generalization_evaluation << std::endl;
01425             }
01426                  }   
01427  
01428          break;
01429       }
01430       else if(display && epoch % display_period == 0)
01431       {
01432          std::cout << "Epoch " << epoch << ";\n"
01433                    << "Parameters norm: " << parameters_norm << "\n"
01434                    << "Performance: " << performance << "\n"
01435                    << "Gradient norm: " << gradient_norm << "\n"
01436                    << performance_functional_pointer->write_information()
01437                    << "Training rate: " << training_rate << "\n"
01438                    << "Elapsed time: " << elapsed_time << std::endl; 
01439 
01440          if(generalization_evaluation != 0)
01441          {
01442             std::cout << "Generalization performance: " << generalization_evaluation << std::endl;
01443          }
01444       }
01445 
01446       // Set new parameters
01447 
01448       parameters += parameters_increment;
01449 
01450       neural_network_pointer->set_parameters(parameters);
01451 
01452       // Update stuff
01453 
01454       old_performance = performance;
01455       old_generalization_evaluation = generalization_evaluation;
01456    
01457       //old_training_rate = training_rate;
01458    } 
01459 
01460    return(Newton_method_training_results_pointer);
01461 */
01462 }

01489 
01490 TiXmlElement* NewtonMethod::to_XML(void) const
01491 {

01493

01495

01639    Newton_method_element->LinkEndChild(maximum_time_element);
01640 
01641    buffer.str("");
01642    buffer << maximum_time;
01643 
01644    TiXmlText* maximum_time_text = new TiXmlText(buffer.str().c_str());
01645    maximum_time_element->LinkEndChild(maximum_time_text);
01646

01648 
01649    TiXmlElement* reserve_parameters_history_element = new TiXmlElement("ReserveParametersHistory");
01650    Newton_method_element->LinkEndChild(reserve_parameters_history_element);
01651 
01652    buffer.str("");

01769

01771    Newton_method_element->LinkEndChild(display_element);
01772 
01773    buffer.str("");
01774    buffer << display;
01775 
01776    TiXmlText* display_text = new TiXmlText(buffer.str().c_str());
01777    display_element->LinkEndChild(display_text);
01778 
01779    return(Newton_method_element);
01780 }

01783 // void from_XML(TiXmlElement*) method
01784 
01785 void NewtonMethod::from_XML(TiXmlElement* newton_method_element)
01786 {
01787    // Training rate algorithm
01788 
01789    TiXmlElement* training_rate_algorithm_element = newton_method_element->FirstChildElement("TrainingRateAlgorithm");
01790    
01791    if(training_rate_algorithm_element)
01792    {
01793       try
01794       {
01795          training_rate_algorithm.from_XML(training_rate_algorithm_element);
01796       }
01797       catch(std::exception& e)
01798       {
01799          std::cout << e.what() << std::endl;             
01800       }
01801    }
01802 
01803    // Warning parameters norm
01804 
01805    TiXmlElement* warning_parameters_norm_element = newton_method_element->FirstChildElement("WarningParametersNorm");
01806 
01807    if(warning_parameters_norm_element)
01808    {
01809       double new_warning_parameters_norm = atof(warning_parameters_norm_element->GetText()); 
01810 
01811       try
01812       {
01813          set_warning_parameters_norm(new_warning_parameters_norm);
01814       }
01815       catch(std::exception& e)
01816       {
01817          std::cout << e.what() << std::endl;             
01818       }
01819    }
01820 
01821    // Warning gradient norm 
01822 
01823    TiXmlElement* warning_gradient_norm_element = newton_method_element->FirstChildElement("WarningGradientNorm");
01824 
01825    if(warning_gradient_norm_element)
01826    {
01827       double new_warning_gradient_norm = atof(warning_gradient_norm_element->GetText()); 
01828 
01829       try
01830       {
01831          set_warning_gradient_norm(new_warning_gradient_norm);
01832       }
01833       catch(std::exception& e)

01835          std::cout << e.what() << std::endl;             
01836       }
01837    }

01844    {

02238 // void set_reserve_all_training_history(bool) method
02239 
02240 void NewtonMethod::set_reserve_all_training_history(const bool& new_reserve_all_training_history)
02241 {
02242    reserve_parameters_history = new_reserve_all_training_history;
02243    reserve_parameters_norm_history = new_reserve_all_training_history;
02244 
02245    reserve_evaluation_history = new_reserve_all_training_history;
02246    reserve_gradient_history = new_reserve_all_training_history;
02247    reserve_gradient_norm_history = new_reserve_all_training_history;
02248    reserve_inverse_Hessian_history = new_reserve_all_training_history;
02249 
02250    reserve_training_direction_history = new_reserve_all_training_history;
02251    reserve_training_rate_history = new_reserve_all_training_history;
02252    reserve_elapsed_time_history = new_reserve_all_training_history;
02253 
02254    reserve_generalization_evaluation_history = new_reserve_all_training_history;
02255 }
